Docs.summary:
Performs checks on an EntryPoint input class equivilent to the checks that are done when parsing a JSON EntryPoint graph.
Call this method from EntryPoint methods to ensure that range and required checks are performed in a consistent manner when EntryPoints are created directly from code.

Docs.summary: Searches for the given column name in the schema. This method applies a common policy that throws an exception if the column is not found and the column name was explicitly specified. If the column is not found and the column name was not explicitly specified, it returns null.
